backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing user profiles, partner/sponsor/affiliate management with subscription-based access control, Stripe payment integration, and role-based authorization using AccessControl and MixinAuthorization modules.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five implemented features (admin/user authentication, partner tracking, Stripe integration, and Twitch-themed design) with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and styling, describing their roles in authentication, partner management, Stripe checkout, and Moonlight Rebels theming.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles defining OKLCH color system with custom design tokens for light and dark modes, implementing Moonlight Rebels pink and purple theme throughout the application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference to main.tsx for the Moonlight Rebels application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for home, partners, admin, and payment pages, wrapped in ThemeProvider and Toaster for dark mode and notifications.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Protected route component that verifies admin permissions using Internet Identity and displays appropriate loading, login prompt, or access denied screens for unauthorized users.
frontend/src/components/BioSection.tsx: Bio section component presenting Aurora's story as a medical mute gamer with inspirational messaging, icons, and styled cards highlighting community values and inclusivity.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright, Caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking parameters, and Twitch social link with responsive layout.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header component with logo, navigation links (Home, Partners, Admin), and a mobile hamburger menu that includes the LoginButton component.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout wrapper component that combines Header, Footer, and children content in a flex column structure.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button that toggles between login/logout states using Internet Identity, with loading states and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/PartnerCard.tsx: Displays partner information with badges for type and category, showing locked/blurred content for users without subscriptions.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog for first-time users to create their profile by entering their name, with form validation and loading states.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetup.tsx: Admin form component for configuring Stripe integration with secret key and allowed countries list.
frontend/src/components/SubscriptionChec: Subscription purchase component that creates a Stripe checkout session for $9.99/month premium access and redirects to Stripe.
frontend/src/components/TwitchButton.tsx: External link button component that directs users to the Twitch channel 'auroramoonveil' with Twitch branding.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that manages the backend actor instance, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, partners, subscriptions, Stripe configuration, and shopping items via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a "Moonlight Rebels" theme (purple/pink color scheme) for both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the root component wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider for state management and authentication.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page protected by AdminGuard that displays Stripe configuration status and provides CRUD operations for managing partners with form inputs and delete confirmations.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page featuring hero section with branding, profile setup modal for new users, bio section, Twitch integration button, and community features grid.
frontend/src/pages/PartnersPage.tsx: Displays partner/sponsor cards with subscription-gated content, showing login prompt for unauthenticated users and subscription checkout for authenticated non-subscribers.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailure.tsx: Payment cancellation page displaying an error state with XCircle icon and two action buttons: 'Try Again' linking to /partners and 'Back to Home' linking to root.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx: Payment success confirmation page that invalidates subscription and partner queries on mount, displays a success message with CheckCircle icon, and provides navigation to /partners or home.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for extracting and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence and cleanup functions for sensitive parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color palette using OKLCH color space (including moonlight/rebel brand colors), container settings, border radius variables, and animation keyframes for accordions.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking implemented features for a Twitch streamer website with dual authentication, partner/subscription management, Stripe integration, and pink/purple branding for Moonlight Rebels.
